text: 11.2 Hos 2.19-20, 1 Ko 4.15, Gal 4.17-18, Epe 5.26-27, Kol 1.28 God ne binɨb yad mɨdupsek muk yɨp okok nep yenɨgel agɨl, gos kɨles gɨl nɨgup. Adek nokom anɨb ak nep, yad nɨbi Klays nop kɨdek gɨnɨmɨb agɨl, gos kɨles gɨl nepin. Nɨbop bin pɨlaj gach ma mɨdɨl suŋtep nep mɨdeb tek mɨdɨl, bɨ nokom dɨnɨg gek, dam bɨ anɨb ak nop ñɨnɨm. Bɨ anɨb ak nɨm Klays.
